sub_title: Art director. Concept, branding and design
summary: Concept machine🔋 but also a versatile and hands-on🖐🏼 creative on a mission to make brands shine✨ brighter. I love💖 creating cutting-edge🔪 work whether it's advertising📢, branding🦓 or digital👾 design. bringing🎒 in +twenty years of international🌎 work experience. Flying solo🧚🏻‍♂️ or co-creating🤹🏼 with a wide variety of personalities👩🏼‍🎤. Let's join forces🤝🏽 and create a better world🏔️ together.

company.name: Thorbecke Art direction, Design & Art projects

profile_positions.company: Thorbecke Art direction, Design & Art projects
profile_positions.description: Freelance creative from Amsterdam creating digital brand experiences for companies such as IKEA, Polestar, Philips, T-Mobile, Cognizant & Nike and the list goes on. Combining passion for the craft of creation with the drive to make brands look and feel better. Making work between the disciplines of branding, advertising, and digital design.
profile_positions.title: Creative Director

profile_positions.description: Developing communication strategies for mostly B2B clients such as Sandoz, DS Smith, Novartis, Dura-Line and LivaNova. Responsible for translating complex substantive communication issues into creative concepts. Idea and implementation of projects ranging from film, photography, animation, digital productions such as websites, e-brochures, apps, VR, sales presentations and graphic expressions such as infographics and print collateral to integrated campaigns, event implementations and (re) branding projects.
profile_positions.title: Senior Creative

profile_positions.description:
In this defining role, I work for one of Total Design’s biggest global clients the ING Bank.
Re-shaping and re-thinking the brand identity, bringing in a new perspective and pushing boundaries. Strategic design thinking and advising working closely together with internal and external teams.
Working independently and presenting new concepts to the client.
Challenging and inspiring teams and clients.
Bringing the brand to live in motion & digital design.
profile_positions.title: Sr. Brand Designer

profile_positions.description: Concept, art direction, and hands-on visual design lead role. Collaborating with a small but driven team of international and multi-disciplined creatives. Creating cutting-edge work on the brink of innovative advertising, technology, and graphic design. Making it work for a wide range of brands such as ING, Lenovo, Netflix, Prenatal, Setapp, and Shortcutz.
profile_positions.title: Sr. Art Director

profile_positions.description: Brand identity project introduced by a collaborative design thinking process which resulted in a new identity including the logo, digital style guide, tone of voice, website, brand movie and various business templates.
profile_positions.title: Design Director (project based)

profile_positions.description: Responsible for the creative output for IKEA's international Culture and Learning competence. Briefing agencies and reviewing the proposals. Ensuring all content reflects the right tone of voice. Getting creatives to understand what is required of them and that creative work is done properly and to brief. Also implementing and improving UX principles together with a new digital style guide and introducing the design thinking method. And where possible driving the internal digital transformation.
profile_positions.title: Creative Director (interim)

profile_positions.description:
Art director / visual design lead for The Collaboratory, Amsterdam.

The Cognizant Digital Works Collaboratory is a physical space where clients come to work through all or part of the Accelerator Methodology
Together with other designers, strategists, technologists and data scientists I work shoulder
to shoulder with industry leaders and futurists to help clients conceptualize, design,
prototype and build digital experiences for today and tomorrow. 
The Collaboratory is located in New York, Amsterdam, London, Singapore and other centers worldwide.

As an art director / visual design lead I execute projects as well as evolve the design practice within our innovation team. I spend much time working with a close team and our clients to imagine the future.
The role of the visual designer is to help bring that vision to life with such clarity that it feels attainable—maybe even inevitable. From videos to prototypes to products and interfaces, the visual designer is a key part of every proposal and project.

While the focus of Cognizant is on solutions that use screen based technology, I am rooted in the skills and traditions of graphic design and I am here to discuss both the nuances of typography as well as the potential of blockchain. 

Responsibilities

•  Establish design best practices and internal guidelines for a systemic design approach
•  Interface design UI elements with a focus on responsive and adaptive design
•  Presentation design and infographics
•  Collaborate in cross-disciplinary teams (strategy, engineering, data science and digital product design) to conceive, validate and produce new experiences, products and services
•  Design experiences for emerging technologies, IoT, and data/analytics driven services that people want to come back to
•  Continually research and improve internal design processes to maximize creative potential
profile_positions.title: Associate director / Art Director

profile_positions.description: Concept development and art direction for the theme, campaign and event experience. TEDx Amsterdam has its own version of this world wide knowledge sharing event and its the annual event to look out for because it has high standards when it comes to innovative event experience and cutting edge design execution.
profile_positions.title: Art director

profile_positions.description: Concept development and visual design direction for the digital department of KLM. Responsible for completing the style guide together with the internal UX design teams, developers and external agencies.
profile_positions.title: Art director

profile_positions.description: Freelance art director at Philips, for several projects for the Consumer Communications department.
profile_positions.title: Art director
